title: Cape Cod National Seashore: Natural Features & Ecosystems
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Nature     Natural Features & Ecosystems               Natural Features & Ecosystems         An aerial photograph showing a variety of ecosystems within the Cape Cod National Seashore.Â  Note the numerous homes; people have a significant combined affect on these natural systems. NPS Photo  Cape Cod has long inspired wonder among those who value nature. From the striking heights of the coastal bluffs to the serenity of a forested pond, it is not difficult to understand why so many become enamored with the natural beauty of this place. The coast, the wetlands, and the woods offer a variety of ecosystems for the experienced naturalist or the neophyte to explore.
